summary: The SKILL.md documentation is largely accurate but contains several discrepancies between documented command syntax and actual CLI implementation. Most issues are minor option formatting differences or missing details about mutual exclusivity.

issues.actual: jira-as agile sprint move-issues -s|--sprint INTEGER --issues TEXT
issues.issue: Option flag documented correctly but parameter naming is inconsistent. Documentation uses positional SPRINT_ID, but actual CLI requires -s/--sprint with INTEGER value.
issues.fix: Change to: jira-as agile sprint move-issues --sprint 456 --issues PROJ-101,PROJ-102

issues.issue: Documentation uses --backlog without the -b short form mentioned. The actual CLI supports both -b and --backlog.
issues.fix: Documentation is correct but could note that -b is the short form

issues.actual: Options: -b|--board INTEGER, -n|--name TEXT, -g|--goal TEXT, -s|--start-date TEXT, -e|--end-date TEXT
issues.issue: Documentation does not mention optional --start-date and --end-date parameters that are available in CLI.
issues.fix: Add documentation for optional date parameters: --start-date and --end-date (YYYY-MM-DD format)

issues.actual: jira-as agile sprint manage -s|--sprint INTEGER --move-incomplete-to INTEGER
issues.issue: Documentation shows --move-incomplete-to but doesn't explain that it only applies with --close flag.
issues.fix: Clarify: --move-incomplete-to is only used with --close. Add example showing date update options: --start-date, --end-date, -n/--name, -g/--goal

issues.actual: Additional options available: -n|--name TEXT, -g|--goal TEXT, --start-date TEXT, --end-date TEXT
issues.issue: CLI supports updating sprint properties (name, goal, dates) but SKILL.md only documents --start and --close operations.
issues.fix: Add examples: jira-as agile sprint manage --sprint 456 --name "Sprint 43" --goal "New Goal"

issues.documented: jira-as agile sprint list --project DEMO --state active
issues.issue: Documentation doesn't mention available --max-results option for limiting returned sprints.
issues.fix: Add example: jira-as agile sprint list --project DEMO --max-results 10

issues.actual: Positional argument [SPRINT_ID] is optional when using -a|--active with -b|--board
issues.issue: SKILL.md shows positional argument but doesn't document the alternative -a|--active approach for getting active sprint.
issues.fix: Add documentation: jira-as agile sprint get --board 123 --active

issues.issue: Documentation should emphasize that --sprint parameter is required for all manage operations.
issues.fix: Ensure all manage examples use -s/--sprint consistently

issues.issue: Documentation uses --points but CLI also supports -p short form. Minor documentation improvement.
issues.fix: Can be documented as: -p/--points (note short form available)

issues.issue: Documentation lists --sprint and --project examples but doesn't document -e|--epic option for getting estimates for a specific epic.
issues.fix: Add example: jira-as agile estimates --epic PROJ-100

issues.documented: jira-as agile epic create --project PROJ --summary "Mobile App MVP"
issues.actual: Additional available options: -a|--assignee TEXT, -p|--priority TEXT, --custom-fields TEXT
issues.issue: SKILL.md shows basic example but doesn't document additional optional parameters (assignee, priority, custom fields).
issues.fix: Add comprehensive example showing optional fields like assignee and priority

issues.issue: Documentation uses --sprints but CLI option is -n|--sprints. The option is correct but short form not mentioned.
issues.fix: Can note that -n is the short form for --sprints

recommendations.title: Document sprint create with optional date parameters
recommendations.description: Add examples showing how to set sprint start and end dates using --start-date and --end-date options in YYYY-MM-DD format.

recommendations.title: Document sprint manage update operations
recommendations.description: Expand sprint manage documentation to show how to update sprint name, goal, and dates - not just start/close operations.

recommendations.title: Document estimates command for epic queries
recommendations.description: Add example showing jira-as agile estimates --epic PROJ-100 to get story point estimates for all issues in an epic.

recommendations.title: Add sprint max-results option
recommendations.description: Document the --max-results option available on sprint list command to limit returned results.

recommendations.title: Document sprint get --active flag
recommendations.description: Add documentation for getting active sprint using --board and --active flags as alternative to positional sprint ID.

recommendations.title: Document epic create optional fields
recommendations.description: Expand epic create examples to show optional fields like --assignee, --priority, and --custom-fields.

verification_method: Compared SKILL.md examples and documented options against actual output of `jira-as agile [subcommand] --help` commands.
notes: All CLI commands executed successfully against jira-as CLI
The skip-issues pattern in sprint move-issues works correctly despite not being explicitly mentioned in help
Output formats (-o|--output text|json) are consistently available across all commands
Dry-run (-n|--dry-run) is available on add-issues and move-issues commands
Most discrepancies are about undocumented optional parameters rather than incorrect syntax
Core commands and workflows documented are accurate
